description: Made from recycled polyester, this plaid barn jacket reverses to a solid-hued side for two Polo looks in one. It's also developed with PrimaLoft® insulation to help keep you warm, dry, and comfortable while considering our environment.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 31.5" body length (front and back), a 19.75" shoulder, a 47" chest, and a 36" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Plaid side: point collar. Solid-hued side: corduroy point collar; leather collar stand. Buttoned placket.
Long sleeves. Solid-hued side: "Polo Ralph Lauren" shield patch with our signature Pony at the left sleeve.
Two front waist patch pockets. Double vent with snapped closures. Fully filled.
This product is made with recycled polyester. By turning industrial and post-consumer polyester waste into new product, we are reducing our dependence on virgin petroleum-based material.
Filled with PrimaLoft®, which is made with recycled polyester. It maintains its loft and warmth without the bulk of down.
Shell, reverse, and fill: 100% recycled polyester. Trim: 100% leather. Machine washable. Imported.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
